meanings.sent2: The cookies were gingerbready and sweet.
meanings.sent3: The gingerbready man smiled warmly at the children.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as warm and comforting as a gingerbready hug.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of gingerbready treats filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: Made of or flavored with gingerbread.
meanings.sent1: She baked a gingerbready cake for the party.
meanings.sent2: The dessert was rich and gingerbready.
meanings.sent3: The cat licked its lips after stealing a bite of the gingerbready dessert.
meanings.sent4: The air was filled with the scent of gingerbready delights.
meanings.sent5: The gingerbready flavor lingered on her tongue.

meanings.definition: Decorated in the style of gingerbread.
meanings.sent1: The gingerbready house was adorned with colorful candies.
meanings.sent2: The table was set with gingerbready plates and cups.
meanings.sent3: The gingerbready decorations sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her outfit was as vibrant and cheerful as a gingerbready display.
meanings.sent5: The room was transformed into a gingerbready wonderland.
